title: Unified launch.sh Replaces Named Scripts in Pre-Approved Scope

comment: QA PRE-REVIEW: CR-056-VAR-002 v0.1 -- RECOMMEND. FRONTMATTER: title='Unified launch.sh Replaces Named Scripts in Pre-Approved Scope' (present, non-empty). revision_summary='Initial draft' (acceptable for v0.1). REQUIRED SECTIONS (SOP-004 9A.3): All 8 sections present -- Variance Identification, Detailed Description, Root Cause, Variance Type, Impact Assessment, Proposed Resolution, Resolution Work (2 EIs), VAR Closure. SCOPE HANDOFF (SOP-004 9A.5): Expected vs actual documented, VAR absorbs cleanup, no scope lost, functional equivalence demonstrated in impact table. PLACEHOLDERS: Found only in executable block editable fields (Sections 7-8), correct per SOP-004 Section 5. TRACEABILITY: References SOP-004, CR-056 (IN_EXECUTION), CR-056-VAR-001, CR-057 (CLOSED), commit 6a56432. All valid. Cross-verified affected sections against parent CR. FORMATTING: No typos, consistent formatting, sequential numbering. DETERMINATION: COMPLIANT.

QA POST-REVIEW: CR-056-VAR-002 -- RECOMMEND. FRONTMATTER: title='Unified launch.sh Replaces Named Scripts in Pre-Approved Scope' (unchanged). revision_summary='Both EIs executed and passing; closure documented' (updated, accurate). PRE-APPROVED CONTENT: Sections 1-6 unchanged from pre-review, integrity confirmed. EXECUTION ITEMS: EI-1 (delete scripts) -- Pass, claude 2026-02-06. Names all five deleted scripts, confirms launch.sh intact. EI-2 (smoke test) -- Pass, lead 2026-02-06. Full end-to-end test by Lead: ./launch.sh claude qa, both agents launched, document routed, inbox notification received, CR cancelled cleanly. Independent verification. Both EIs have all editable fields filled per SOP-004 Section 7.1. EVIDENCE: Adequate per SOP-004 Section 8 -- script names listed, test methodology and results documented. VAR CLOSURE (Section 8): Details='Five obsolete scripts deleted, Lead confirmed e2e test pass, naming deviation retroactively authorized.' Outcome='Resolved'. Performed By='claude + lead - 2026-02-06'. PLACEHOLDER CHECK: Zero placeholders remaining in any section. POST-REVIEW GATE (SOP-004 Section 10): All EIs Pass, no nested VARs, evidence documented. FORMATTING: No typos, consistent formatting, sequential numbering. DETERMINATION: COMPLIANT.
